data.enText: the quality of being expressed clearly
a lack of clarity in the law

data.chText: 清晰的思维（或理解）能力
data.enText: the ability to think about or understand sth clearly

data.chText: 思路清楚；目的明确；视野清晰
（画面、物质或声音的）清晰，清楚，清澈
data.enText: if a picture, substance or sound has clarity , you can see or hear it very clearly, or see through it easily
the clarity of sound on a CD

simple_means.memory_skill: clar 清楚的，明白的 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 清澈；清晰

means: 清晰的思维(或理解)能力
(画面、物质或声音的)清晰，清澈

example: when she awoke the clarity was back in her eyes

tr: free from obscurity and easy to understand

value.def: The clarity of something such as a book or argument is its quality of being well explained and easy to understand.

example.ex: ...the ease and clarity with which the author explains difficult technical and scientific subjects.
example.tran: 作者解释复杂的科技主题时的游刃有余、清晰透彻

value.tran: (书、论点等的)清楚，清晰易懂，明晰

value.def: Clarity is the ability to think clearly.

example.ex: In business circles he is noted for his flair and clarity of vision.
example.tran: 在商界，他的天赋和远见卓识是出了名的。

value.def: Clarity is the quality of being clear in outline or sound.

example.ex: This remarkable technology provides far greater clarity than conventional x-rays.
example.tran: 这项卓越技术的清晰度比常规的X光高得多。

value.def: The clarity of a liquid, of glass, or of the air is the degree to which it is clear.

example.ex: The first thing to strike me was the amazing clarity of the water.
example.tran: 首先吸引我的是水的无比清澈。

value.tran: (液体、玻璃或空气的)清澈度，透明度

rootsaffixes.indicate: = clear, bright 清楚的, 明白的
rootsaffixes.title: clear, clar, clair

partsOfSpeech.dec: clar 清楚的，明白的 + ification …化 → 澄清；纯化
clar 清楚的，明白的 + ify 使… → 澄清；阐明
clar 清楚的，明白的 + ity 具备某种性质，状况 → 清澈；清晰
clear 清楚的，明白的 + ance 表性质 → 清算；清除
de 加强 + clar 清楚的，明白的 + ation 行为，过程，状态，结果 → 强调清楚 → 宣言
de 加强 + clar 清楚的，明白的 + e → 宣称；断言
